alert.note: Alert for Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 9:33AM CDT until October 29 at 8:20AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Chambers Creek Near Rice affecting Navarro County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chambers Creek near Rice. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur along the creek. This will be a problem for some cattle and farm industries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 24.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening to 15.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will rise to 18.6 feet Monday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
